straightshakes.title: Oreo Delight
straightshakes.prompt: A luxurious milkshake in a clear cup with black and white striped straw. Creamy cookies-and-cream colored shake with visible Oreo cookie crumbles throughout. Topped with whipped cream, crushed Oreo pieces, and a whole Oreo cookie standing upright. Dark chocolate drizzle cascading down the sides of whipped cream. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting. Make sure the sticker on the cup looks realistic.

straightshakes.title: Strawberry Dream
straightshakes.prompt: A vibrant pink milkshake in a clear cup with bright pink and white striped straw. Smooth strawberry-pink colored shake. Topped with fluffy white whipped cream, fresh strawberry slices, strawberry syrup drizzle, and a whole fresh strawberry with leaves on top. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting. Make sure the sticker on the cup looks realistic.

straightshakes.title: Milo Magic
straightshakes.prompt: A rich chocolate-brown milkshake in a clear cup with brown and cream striped straw. Deep malty chocolate colored shake with visible Milo powder texture. Topped with whipped cream, generous dusting of Milo powder, chocolate sauce drizzle, and chocolate shavings. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting. Make sure the sticker on the cup looks realistic.

straightshakes.title: Chocolate Fudge
straightshakes.prompt: A decadent dark chocolate milkshake in a clear cup with brown and gold striped straw. Ultra-rich dark brown colored shake with thick, velvety texture. Topped with whipped cream, hot fudge sauce dripping down sides, chocolate chunks, and chocolate curls. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting. Make sure the sticker on the cup looks realistic.

straightshakes.title: Caramel Swirl
straightshakes.prompt: A golden-brown milkshake in a clear cup with caramel and cream striped straw. Creamy caramel-colored shake with visible caramel sauce swirls inside the cup. Topped with whipped cream, caramel sauce drizzle, toffee pieces, and a wafer stick. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting. Make sure the sticker on the cup looks realistic.

straightshakes.title: Vegan Vanilla Delight
straightshakes.prompt: A clean white milkshake in a clear cup with white and gold striped straw. Smooth vanilla-cream colored shake. Topped with coconut whipped cream, vanilla bean specks visible, edible flowers, and a vanilla pod garnish. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting. Make sure the sticker on the cup looks realistic. V or leaf symbol visible.

Topped with whipped cream, orange zest, dark chocolate shavings, and an orange slice garnish. Small 21+ badge visible. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting. Topped with whipped cream, caramel drizzle, crushed nuts, and a cinnamon stick. Small 21+ badge visible. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting. shotshakes.title: Baileys Berry
shotshakes.prompt: A light pink-cream milkshake in a clear cup with pink and white striped straw. Creamy strawberry-cream colored shake with smooth texture. Topped with whipped cream, fresh berries (strawberries, raspberries), chocolate shavings, and a chocolate-dipped strawberry. Small 21+ badge visible. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting. shotshakes.prompt: A rich coffee-brown milkshake in a clear cup with black and white striped straw. Deep coffee-colored shake with creamy foam on top. Topped with whipped cream, espresso beans, cocoa powder dusting, chocolate-covered coffee beans, and a biscotti stick. Small 21+ badge visible. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting. icecream.title: Classic Vanilla Cone
icecream.prompt: A traditional wafer cone filled with smooth white vanilla ice cream. Two generous scoops with clean, creamy appearance. Simple and elegant presentation with vanilla bean specks visible in the ice cream. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting.

icecream.title: Double Chocolate Cone
icecream.prompt: A wafer cone filled with rich dark chocolate ice cream. Two large scoops of deep brown chocolate ice cream. Topped with chocolate chips, chocolate sauce drizzle, and a chocolate flake stick inserted in the top scoop. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting.

icecream.title: Strawberry Swirl Cone
icecream.prompt: A wafer cone filled with pink strawberry ice cream with visible strawberry ripples. Two scoops showing natural strawberry pieces throughout. Topped with fresh strawberry slice and strawberry syrup drizzle. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting.

icecream.title: Caramel Crunch Cone
icecream.prompt: A wafer cone filled with golden caramel ice cream. Two scoops of creamy caramel-colored ice cream. Topped with caramel sauce drizzle, crushed honeycomb pieces, and toffee chunks scattered on top. Plain background for menu. Realistic lighting.
